unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Martial Discipline, Light Armour, Lightning Reflexes

unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Martial Discipline, Light Armour, Lightning Reflexes

unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Martial Discipline, Master of Spellcrafting, Lightning Reflexes

unit.description: 20-50 models, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Martial Discipline, Scoring, Light Armour, Shield, Fight in Extra Rank, Lightning Reflexes, Spear

unit.name: Highborn Lancers
unit.description: 5-15 models, 0-4 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Martial Discipline, Scoring, Heavy Armour, Shield, Highborn Lancer: Lightning Reflexes, Lance, Elven Horse: Harnessed

unit.name: Citizen Archers
unit.description: 10-30 models, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Martial Discipline, Scoring, Light Armour, Lightning Reflexes, Longbow (3+)

unit.name: Elein Reavers
unit.description: 5-10 models, 0-4 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Feigned Flight, Light Troops, Martial Discipline, Vanguard, Light Armour, Elein Reaver: Lightning Reflexes, Light Lance, Elven Horse: Harnessed

unit.name: Sea Guard
unit.description: 15-30 models, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Martial Discipline, Scoring, Light Armour, Shield, Cover Volley, Lightning Reflexes, Steady Aim, Bow (3+), Spear

unit.name: Sword Masters
unit.description: 5-30 models, 0-4 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Martial Discipline, Scoring, Heavy Armour, Lightning Reflexes, Sword Sworn, Great Weapon

unit.name: Lion Guard
unit.description: 10-30 models, 0-5 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Bodyguard (High Prince that is the General), Martial Discipline, Scoring, Strider (Forest), Valiant, Heavy Armour, Lions Fur, Lightning Reflexes, Multiple Wounds (2, against Large and Beasts, Large and Cavalry, Gigantic), Great Weapon

equipment.name: Gain Baleig Highlanders and lose Scoring

unit.name: Flame Wardens
unit.description: 15-25 models, 0-5 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Fearless, Martial Discipline, Scoring, Aegis (4+), Heavy Armour, Fight in Extra Rank, Lightning Reflexes, Halberd

unit.name: Knights of Ryma
unit.description: 5-12 models, 0-4 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Martial Discipline, Scoring, Dragonforged Armour, Shield, Knight of Ryma: Devastating Charge (+1 Att), Lightning Reflexes, Lance, Elven Horse: Harnessed

unit.name: Reaver Chariots
unit.description: 1-4 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Construct, Base 50x100 mm, Light Troops, Martial Discipline, Swiftstride, Crew (2): Lightning Reflexes, Light Lance, Longbow (3+), Elven Horse (2): Harnessed, Chassis: Impact Hits (D6), Inanimate

unit.name: Lion Chariot
unit.description: single model, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Construct, Base 50x100 mm, Martial Discipline, Swiftstride, Valiant, Heavy Armour, Crew (2): Lightning Reflexes, Multiple Wounds (2, against Large and Beasts, Large and Cavalry, Gigantic), Great Weapon, Lion (2): Harnessed, Chassis: Impact Hits (D6+1), Inanimate

unit.name: Giant Eagles
unit.description: 1-5 models, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Beast, Base 50x50 mm, Fly (9", 18"), Light Troops

unit.name: Queens Guard
unit.description: 5-20 models, 0-3 Units/Army, 0-20 Models/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Martial Discipline, Scoring, Light Armour, Lightning Reflexes, Moonlight Arrows, Longbow (2+)

unit.name: Grey Watchers
unit.description: 5-10 models, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Light Troops, Martial Discipline, Skirmisher, Hard Target (1), Light Armour, Accurate, Fae Miasma, Lightning Reflexes, Longbow (2+), Scout (0-1 Units/Army)

unit.name: Sea Guard Reaper
unit.description: single model, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Construct, Base 60 mm round, Martial Discipline, War Machine, Light Armour, Lightning Reflexes, Move or Fire, Elven Bolt Thrower (3+)

unit.name: Sky Sloop
unit.description: single model, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Construct, Base 50x100 mm, Fly (9", 9"), Light Troops, Martial Discipline, Swiftstride, Hard Target (1), Light Armour, Crew (2): Lightning Reflexes, Light Lance, Hawk: Harnessed, Chassis: Impact Hits (D6), Inanimate, Sky Reaper (3+)

unit.name: Phoenix
unit.description: single model, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Gigantic, Type Beast, Base 50x100 mm, Fly (9", 18"), Light Troops, Rebirth

mount.description: Height Large, Type Cavalry, Base 50x50 mm, Fear, Fly (8", 16"), Light Troops, Towering Presence, Devastating Charge (+1 Att, +1 Str, +1 AP), Harnessed, Lightning Reflexes

mount.name: Young Dragon
Young Dragon (Queens Cavalier)
Young Dragon (Order of the Fiery Heart)
mount.description: Height Large, Type Cavalry, Base 50x100 mm, Fear, Fly (7", 14"), Light Troops, Towering Presence, Breath Attack (Str 4, AP 1, Flaming Attacks), Harnessed, Stomp Attacks (D3)

mount.name: Dragon
Dragon (Queens Cavalier)
Dragon (Order of the Fiery Heart)

mount.name: Ancient Dragon
Ancient Dragon (Queens Cavalier)
mount.description: 0-1 Mounts/Army, One of a Kind, Height Gigantic, Type Beast, Base 100x150 mm, Fly (7", 16"), Light Troops, Breath Attack (Str 4, AP 1, Flaming Attacks), Harnessed

mount.name: Reaver Chariot
mount.description: Height Large, Type Construct, Base 50x100 mm, Light Troops, Swiftstride, Crew (2): Lightning Reflexes, Light Lance, Longbow (3+), Elven Horse (2): Harnessed, Chassis: Impact Hits (D6), Inanimate

mount.name: Lion Chariot
Lion Chariot (Royal Huntsman)
mount.description: Height Large, Type Construct, Base 50x100 mm, Swiftstride, Crew: Lightning Reflexes, Multiple Wounds (2, against Large and Beasts, Large and Cavalry, Gigantic), Great Weapon, Lion (2): Harnessed, Chassis: Impact Hits (D6+1), Inanimate

mount.name: Sky Sloop
Sky Sloop (Fleet Officer)
mount.description: Height Large, Type Construct, Base 50x100 mm, Fly (9", 9"), Light Troops, Swiftstride, Hard Target (1), Crew: Lightning Reflexes, Light Lance, Hawk: Harnessed, Chassis: Impact Hits (D6), Inanimate, Sky Reaper (3+)

item.name: Martial Discipline
item.description: If more than half of a units models have Martial Discipline, their Discipline Tests are subject to Minimised Roll except for Panic and Break Tests.

item.name: Master of Spellcrafting
item.description: The Wizards spells have their Casting Value reduced by 1. When performing a Casting Attempt with a single Magic Dice, a natural roll of 1 or 2 is always a failed Casting Attempt, regardless of any modifiers.

item.name: Valiant
item.description: The model is immune to the effects of Fear. If more than half of a units models have Valiant, the unit automatically passes Panic Tests caused by Terror.

item.name: Fae Miasma
item.description: Close Combat, Shooting. This Attack Attribute can only be used with Longbows and Paired Weapons. When a unit is hit by attacks with Fae Miasma, it must take a Resilience Test for each hit, using the Resilience that the largest proportion of models in the unit has. Use the higher value in case of a tie. If one or more Resilience Tests are failed, all models in the unit are affected by Fae Miasma until the start of the Active Players next Player Turn. A model that is affected by one or more instances of Fae Miasma suffers a −1 to-hit modifier (both for Shooting Attacks and Close Combat Attacks).

item.name: Moonlight Arrows
item.description: Shooting. This Attack Attribute can only be used with Bows or Longbows without Weapon Enchantments. The attacks become Flaming Attacks and Magical Attacks, and have their Strength set to 4 and their Armour Penetration set to 1.

item.name: Dragonforged Armour
item.description: Armour Equipment. Follows the rules for Heavy Armour (can be enchanted as if it was Heavy Armour). In addition, the wearer gains Aegis (2+, against Flaming Attacks) and Aegis (6+), and automatically fails all Fortitude Saves.

item.name: Lions Fur
item.description: Armour Equipment. If on foot, the wearer gains +1 Armour, which is improved to +2 Armour against Shooting Attacks. AMR

item.name: Master of Canreig Tower
item.description: The model gains Master of Spellcrafting, Protean Magic, Wizard Adept, and Sword Sworn (see Sword Masters unit). The model has access to Alchemy, Cosmology, Druidism, Shamanism, and Witchcraft. It knows 3 spells, and always knows The Oaken Throne in addition to these spells. Fountain of Youth becomes the Attribute Spell for all non-Bound Learned Spells cast by the model except The Oaken Throne, replacing the spells corresponding Attribute Spells where applicable.

item.name: High Warden of the Flame
item.description: The bearer gains Aegis (4+), Fearless, Flaming Attacks, Magic Resistance (1), and cannot be equipped with a Shield.

item.name: Fleet Officer
item.description: The bearer gains Cover Volley (see Sea Guard Core unit), Steady Aim, and +2 to-hit when using a Sky Reaper. An army with one or more Fleet Officers may add +1 to the roll for choosing Deployment Zones. Panic Tests of models with Martial Discipline within the models range of Commanding Presence or Rally Around the Flag (if applicable) are subject to Minimised Roll.

item.name: Queens Cavalier
item.description: The bearer gains Devastating Charge (+1 Att, Fear). If the bearers model is Large or Gigantic: The limit of Ancient Allies is increased to “Max. 25%", Characters is increased to “Max. 50%", and all Characters in the army must be Large Cavalry or Gigantic Beasts. Dragons and Ancient Dragons become 0-2 Mounts/Army. Sea Guard Reapers and Sky Sloops may not be taken in the army.

item.name: Queens Companion
item.description: The models unit gains Quick to Fire. When shooting with a Longbow without Weapon Enchantment, the weapon gains Shots 3.

item.name: Royal Huntsman
item.description: The model gains Lions Fur and the models unit gains Valiant. When using a Great Weapon, the bearer gains Multiple Wounds (2, against Large and Beasts, Large and Cavalry, Gigantic).

item.name: Asfad Scholar
item.description: Wizard Masters only. The range of Aura spells cast by the Wizard is increased by 3", and the range of all other spells cast by the Wizard is increased by 6". Spells with the type Caster or Casters Unit and Bound Spells are not affected. The Wizard can cast Drain Magic as a Bound Spell with Power Level (4/8). - Drain Magic: Range 18", Type Universal, Duration Instant. All spells with duration One Turn for which the target of Drain Magic was the spells target immediately come to an end. Note that if any of these spells had more than one target, their effects also end for these targets.

item.name: Order of the Fiery Heart
item.description: The bearers model gains Flaming Attacks. The model must select spells from either Alchemy or Pyromancy (instead of the Paths normally available to it), and ignores the Missile and Damage spell types for Molten Copper (Alchemy) and all Pyromancy spells, but only when targeting units which are Engaged in Combat with the model. The first time in each Magic Phase that the bearer successfully casts a Learned Spell, its mount (if there is any) gains +1" Advance Rate, +2" March Rate, and +2 Attack Value. The effects last until the start of the owners next Magic Phase.

item.name: Sliver of the Blazing Dawn
item.description: Enchantment: Spear. Attacks made with this weapon gain +1 Strength, +2 Armour Penetration, and become Magical Attacks. Each successful to-hit roll with this weapon causes two hits instead of one.

item.name: Elus Heartwood
item.description: Enchantment: Longbow. This weapon gains Shots 3, Str as user +1, AP as user +1, and Magical Attacks.

item.name: Nova Flare
item.description: Enchantment: Lance. Attacks made with this weapon gain Devastating Charge (+1 Att) and Lethal Strike, and become Divine Attacks and Magical Attacks. One use only. May be activated at the start of any Round of Combat. The wielder counts as Charging for the purpose of Devastating Charge.

item.name: Gleaming Robe
item.description: Standard Height Mages only. Enchantment: Light Armour. The wearer gains Aegis (3+) and its Armour is set to 1, which cannot be improved. If the wearer Miscasts and rolls Magical Inferno or Witchfire, the number of hits is halved, rounding fractions up.

item.name: Protection of Dorac
item.description: Models on foot only. Enchantment: Heavy Armour. The wearer gains +2 Armour and +2 Defensive Skill.

item.name: Star Metal Alloy
item.description: Enchantment: Shield. The first time the bearers model suffers an unsaved wound from an attack with Multiple Wounds while using this Shield, the number of wounds suffered is halved, rounding fractions up.

item.name: Daemons Bane
item.description: Enchantment: Suit of Armour. The wearer gains +2 Armour against Magical Attacks.

item.name: Banner of Becalming
item.description: Cannot be taken by units that count towards Core. In the opponents Magic Phase, during Siphon the Veil before converting Veil Tokens into Magic Dice, remove one Veil Token from the opponents Veil Token pool and add one Veil Token to your Veil Token pool.

item.name: Navigators Banner
item.description: R&F models in the bearers unit gain Distracting in the First Round of Combat against attacks from enemies Engaged in the bearers units Front Facing.

item.name: War Banner of Ryma
item.description: R&F model parts without Harnessed in a unit with one or more War Banners of Ryma gain Devastating Charge (+1 Str). In addition, all Infantry models in the unit gain Devastating Charge (+1" Adv).

item.name: Book of Meladys
item.description: Dominant. Once per Magic Phase, the bearer may reroll a single Magic Dice when making a casting roll, provided the spell was not Miscast. When rerolling a natural 1, the rerolled Magic Dice benefits from Fizzle (if the Casting Attempt fails) regardless of the rerolled value.

item.name: Diadem of Protection
item.description: The bearer gains Aegis (+2, max 4+).

item.name: Ring of the Pearl Throne
item.description: Cannot be taken by Gigantic models. After step 4 of the Round of Combat Sequence (after issuing and accepting Duels), choose one of the following: - A single Special Item on a Character or Champion in base contact with the bearer - A single Special Item on a single model unit in base contact with the bearer - A Banner Enchantment carried by a Standard Bearer in base contact with the bearer The effects of this Special Item are ignored for as long as its bearer remains in base contact with the bearer of the Ring of the Pearl Throne. Only a single Special Item can be affected at any time. In case the model has more than one instance of the chosen item, only one instance is affected.

item.name: Amethyst Crystal
item.description: Wizards only. Dispelling rolls made by the bearers army gain a +1 modifier.

item.name: Glittering Lacquer
item.description: Cavalry models only. The bearer gains Hard Target (1).

item.name: Sky Reaper
item.description: Artillery Weapon. Range 24", Shots 4, Str 5, AP 3, Quick to Fire.

item.name: Cover Volley
item.description: Attack Attribute - Shooting. When an enemy unit declares a Charge against a unit with Martial Discipline, a single friendly unit containing one or more models with Cover Volley may immediately perform a Stand and Shoot Charge Reaction with the following conditions and restrictions: - The distance between the Charger and the Charged unit must be greater than the Chargers Advance Rate (using the lowest value among the Charging models if there is more than one). - The unit with Cover Volley is within 12" of the Charged unit. - Only models with Cover Volley may shoot. - The unit must use Stand and Shoot before the Charged unit declares its Charge Reaction. If the Charge is no longer possible after the units Stand and Shoot (e.g. due to the Charging unit being destroyed or failing a Panic Test), the Charged unit does not declare any Charge Reaction. - The Stand and Shoot Charge Reaction is performed as if the enemy had declared the Charge against the unit with Cover Volley in their current position (apply the normal rules for the Stand and Shoot Charge Reaction, i.e. the Charging unit must be Located in the Front Arc of the unit with Cover Volley, the unit with Cover Volley cannot be Shaken or Fleeing, etc.).

item.name: Steady Aim
item.description: Attack Attribute - Shooting. The model can shoot from the third rank (in addition to the first and second) and it does not suffer to-hit penalties for Stand and Shoot Charge Reactions.

item.name: Sword Sworn
item.description: Attack Attribute - Close Combat. The model part gains a +1 to-hit modifier when attacking with a Great Weapon.

item.name: Baleig Highlanders
Gain Baleig Highlanders and lose Scoring
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains Hard Target (1), Light Troops, and Skirmisher.

item.name: Elven Bolt Thrower
Elven Bolt Thrower (3+)
item.description: Artillery Weapon. This Artillery Weapon can be fired in two ways: - Range 48", Shots 1, Str 3 [6], AP 10, Area Attack (1x5), [Multiple Wounds (D3)] - Range 48", Shots 6, Str 4, AP 2

item.name: Rebirth
item.description: Universal Rule. The first time a Phoenix loses its last Health Point, the owner must roll a D6. The roll is successful on a roll of 5+ (or 3+ if the model has Wardens Bond): - Remove the model as a casualty as usual, but place a marker on the centre of the models final position. - In the next Player Turn, at the start of step 3 of the Movement Phase Sequence (after Rallying Fleeing units), the Phoenix model is placed back on the Battlefield. The centre of the model must be placed within 3" of the marker and the model must be placed more than 1" away from other units and Impassable Terrain, facing any direction. - If the model cannot be placed following these rules, it cannot return for the rest of the game. - The returned model is the same model that left the game, including any and all ongoing effects (such as spells affecting the model), with the exception that it always returns with only 1 Health Point left and counts as Rallied in case it was Fleeing when it lost its last Health Point (and thus is Shaken until the end of the Player Turn). - The model does not grant Victory Point for being Destroyed if it still has Health Points left at the end of the game. - If the roll fails, follow the normal rules (i.e. the model is removed as a casualty).

item.name: Fire Phoenix
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains Aegis (2+, against Flaming Attacks), Flaming Attacks, and Grind Attacks (D6). The model may perform a Sweeping Attack. The enemy unit suffers D6 hits and an additional D3 hits for each rank after the first. The Grind Attacks and Sweeping Attacks are resolved with Strength 4, Armour Penetration 1, and Flaming Attacks.

item.name: Frost Phoenix
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains Aegis (5+), Fearless, and Supernal. Enemy units in base contact with one or more Frost Phoenixes suffer −2 Agility, −2 Offensive Skill, and −2 Defensive Skill.

item.name: Wardens Bond
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains +1 Discipline, Martial Discipline, and passes its Rebirth roll on 3+ instead of 5+. The Phoenix model part gains Harnessed. The model gains an additional model part.

rule.name: HE#26
rule.leftTerm: Young Dragon (Order of the Fiery Heart)

rule.name: HE#46
rule.leftTerm: Gain Baleig Highlanders and lose Scoring

rule.leftTerm: Gain Baleig Highlanders and lose Scoring

rule.name: HE#66
rule.leftTerm: Gain Baleig Highlanders and lose Scoring
